title: Move Audio section to render directly below Mantra text (above Meaning)

requirements.text: Update the single-page UI layout so that when the Audio section is shown (currently only for Veda = Samaveda and Mantra Number = 47), it renders directly below the Mantra Text section (i.e., after the mantra text content card) and before the Meaning section, instead of rendering below the Meaning card. Preserve all existing Audio section behavior (upload, playback, loading/error/empty states) and keep all existing user-facing text in English.

quotes: Audio should be displayed below the mantra but now it shows below the meaning

acceptanceCriteria: When selecting Veda = Samaveda and Mantra Number = 47, the Audio card appears visually below the Mantra Text card and above the Meaning card.
When selecting any other (Veda, Mantra Number) combination, the Audio section is not rendered (same behavior as today).
No existing audio functionality regresses: audio fetch/playback still works when audio exists; upload/replace still works; loading/error/empty states render as before.

constraints: Frontend files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be modified.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change backend audio storage APIs or data models.
Do not change which mantras/vedas show the Audio section (still only Samaveda mantra 47 unless separately requested).
Do not redesign the Audio component UI beyond what is necessary to move its placement in the page.
